name: Haterade
description:
A lemonade so delicious that the haters start to come out of the woodwork.

FLV Lemonade- Base, delicious tangy lemonade

TFA Blackberry- Adds the darker berry notes

FLV Pink Guava- Really comes across more like a grapefruit here.

Cap Super Sweet- Absolutely subjective. It's in almost every one of my mixes, but when I mixed this for my supervisor he asked for it to be dropped down to .2%


I mixed this for a Tuesday that I was going golfing. I had hoped it would turn out well, but I was pleasantly surprised! This one is absolutely a good SNV, but I do think that it gets better after about a day. Please give any feedback.

FA Fuji- For sweetness and juiciness.
author: BradH

reviews.text: Mixed this Today without Pink Guava (hate Pink Guava), amazing Stuff :)
